name: ORDER_COND_QUESNS
description: The ORDER_COND_QUESNS table contains the inpatient condition questions (if configured) for an order

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COND_QUESN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the question record that identifies the condition question for an inpatient order.

columns.name: COND_QUESN_DAT
columns.description: The contact date of the question record that identifies the condition question for an inpatient order.

columns.name: COND_QUESN_RESP
columns.description: The response to a condition question for an inpatient order
